Uses of Class
jcolibri.evaluation.Evaluator

Packages that use Evaluator
jcolibri.evaluation.evaluators Several evaluators implementations 
jcolibri.extensions.maintenance_evaluation Classes to evaluate maintenance applications (implemented by Lisa Cummins). 
jcolibri.extensions.maintenance_evaluation.evaluators Several maintenance evaluators 
 

Uses of Evaluator in jcolibri.evaluation.evaluators
 

Subclasses of Evaluator in jcolibri.evaluation.evaluators
 class HoldOutEvaluator
          This method splits the case base in two sets: one used for testing where each case is used as query, and another that acts as normal case base.
 class LeaveOneOutEvaluator
          This methods uses all the cases as queries.
 class NFoldEvaluator
          This evaluation method divides the case base into several random folds (indicated by the user).
 class SameSplitEvaluator
          This method splits the case base in two sets: one used for testing where each case is used as query, and another that acts as normal case base.
 

Uses of Evaluator in jcolibri.extensions.maintenance_evaluation
 

Subclasses of Evaluator in jcolibri.extensions.maintenance_evaluation
 class MaintenanceEvaluator
          This abstract class defines the common behaviour of a maintenance evaluator.
 

Uses of Evaluator in jcolibri.extensions.maintenance_evaluation.evaluators
 

Subclasses of Evaluator in jcolibri.extensions.maintenance_evaluation.evaluators
 class MaintenanceHoldOutEvaluator
          This evaluation splits the case base in two sets: a training set and a test set.
 class MaintenanceLeaveOneOutEvaluator
          This evalutation takes each case in turn to be the query.
 class MaintenanceNFoldEvaluator
          This evaluation divides the case base into several random folds (indicated by the user).
 class MaintenanceSameSplitEvaluator
          This evaluation splits the case base in two sets: one used for testing where each case is used as query, and another that acts as normal case base.
